14 template <typename VoxelType>
15 bool LoadBlocksFromFile(
16  const std::string& file_path,
17  typename Layer<VoxelType>::BlockMergingStrategy strategy,
18  bool multiple_layer_support, Layer<VoxelType>* layer_ptr) {
19  CHECK_NOTNULL(layer_ptr);
20  CHECK(!file_path.empty());
21 
22  // Open and check the file
23  std::fstream proto_file;
24  proto_file.open(file_path, std::fstream::in);
25  if (!proto_file.is_open()) {
26  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not open protobuf file to load layer: " << file_path;
27  return false;
28  }
29 
30  // Byte offset result, used to keep track where we are in the file if
31  // necessary.
32  uint32_t tmp_byte_offset = 0;
33 
34  bool layer_found = false;
35 
36  do {
37  // Get number of messages
38  uint32_t num_protos;
39  if (!utils::readProtoMsgCountToStream(&proto_file, &num_protos,
40  &tmp_byte_offset)) {
41  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not read number of messages.";
42  return false;
43  }
44 
45  if (num_protos == 0u) {
46  LOG(WARNING) << "Empty protobuf file!";
47  return false;
48  }
49 
50  // Get header and check if it is compatible with existing layer.
51  LayerProto layer_proto;
52  if (!utils::readProtoMsgFromStream(&proto_file, &layer_proto,
53  &tmp_byte_offset)) {
54  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not read layer protobuf message.";
55  return false;
56  }
57 
58  if (layer_ptr->isCompatible(layer_proto)) {
59  layer_found = true;
60  } else if (!multiple_layer_support) {
61  LOG(ERROR)
62  << "The layer information read from file is not compatible with "
63  "the current layer!";
64  return false;
65  } else {
66  // Figure out how much offset to jump forward by. This is the number of
67  // blocks * the block size... Actually maybe we just read them in? This
68  // is probably easiest. Then if there's corrupted blocks, we abort.
69  // We just don't add these to the layer.
70  const size_t num_blocks = num_protos - 1;
71  for (uint32_t block_idx = 0u; block_idx < num_blocks; ++block_idx) {
72  BlockProto block_proto;
73  if (!utils::readProtoMsgFromStream(&proto_file, &block_proto,
74  &tmp_byte_offset)) {
75  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not read block protobuf message number "
76  << block_idx;
77  return false;
78  }
79  }
80  continue;
81  }
82 
83  // Read all blocks and add them to the layer.
84  const size_t num_blocks = num_protos - 1;
85  for (uint32_t block_idx = 0u; block_idx < num_blocks; ++block_idx) {
86  BlockProto block_proto;
87  if (!utils::readProtoMsgFromStream(&proto_file, &block_proto,
88  &tmp_byte_offset)) {
89  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not read block protobuf message number "
90  << block_idx;
91  return false;
92  }
93 
94  if (!layer_ptr->addBlockFromProto(block_proto, strategy)) {
95  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not add the block protobuf message to the layer!";
96  return false;
97  }
98  }
99  } while (multiple_layer_support && !layer_found && !proto_file.eof());
100  return layer_found;
101 }
102 
103 template <typename VoxelType>
104 bool LoadBlocksFromFile(
105  const std::string& file_path,
106  typename Layer<VoxelType>::BlockMergingStrategy strategy,
107  Layer<VoxelType>* layer_ptr) {
108  constexpr bool multiple_layer_support = false;
109  return LoadBlocksFromFile(file_path, strategy, multiple_layer_support,
110  layer_ptr);
111 }
112 
113 template <typename VoxelType>
114 bool LoadLayer(const std::string& file_path, const bool multiple_layer_support,
115  typename Layer<VoxelType>::Ptr* layer_ptr) {
116  CHECK_NOTNULL(layer_ptr);
117  CHECK(!file_path.empty());
118 
119  // Open and check the file
120  std::fstream proto_file;
121  proto_file.open(file_path, std::fstream::in);
122  if (!proto_file.is_open()) {
123  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not open protobuf file to load layer: " << file_path;
124  return false;
125  }
126 
127  // Byte offset result, used to keep track where we are in the file if
128  // necessary.
129  uint32_t tmp_byte_offset = 0;
130 
131  bool layer_found = false;
132 
133  do {
134  // Get number of messages
135  uint32_t num_protos;
136  if (!utils::readProtoMsgCountToStream(&proto_file, &num_protos,
137  &tmp_byte_offset)) {
138  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not read number of messages.";
139  return false;
140  }
141 
142  if (num_protos == 0u) {
143  LOG(WARNING) << "Empty protobuf file!";
144  return false;
145  }
146 
147  // Get header and check if it is compatible with existing layer.
148  LayerProto layer_proto;
149  if (!utils::readProtoMsgFromStream(&proto_file, &layer_proto,
150  &tmp_byte_offset)) {
151  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not read layer protobuf message.";
152  return false;
153  }
154 
155  if ((layer_proto.voxel_size() <= 0.0f) ||
156  (layer_proto.voxels_per_side() == 0u)) {
157  LOG(ERROR)
158  << "Invalid parameter in layer protobuf message. Check the format.";
159  return false;
160  }
161 
162  if (getVoxelType<VoxelType>().compare(layer_proto.type()) == 0) {
163  layer_found = true;
164  } else if (!multiple_layer_support) {
165  LOG(ERROR)
166  << "The layer information read from file is not compatible with "
167  "the current layer!";
168  return false;
169  } else {
170  // Figure out how much offset to jump forward by. This is the number of
171  // blocks * the block size... Actually maybe we just read them in? This
172  // is probably easiest. Then if there's corrupted blocks, we abort.
173  // We just don't add these to the layer.
174  const size_t num_blocks = num_protos - 1;
175  for (uint32_t block_idx = 0u; block_idx < num_blocks; ++block_idx) {
176  BlockProto block_proto;
177  if (!utils::readProtoMsgFromStream(&proto_file, &block_proto,
178  &tmp_byte_offset)) {
179  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not read block protobuf message number "
180  << block_idx;
181  return false;
182  }
183  }
184  continue;
185  }
186 
187  *layer_ptr = aligned_shared<Layer<VoxelType> >(layer_proto);
188  CHECK(*layer_ptr);
189 
190  // Read all blocks and add them to the layer.
191  const size_t num_blocks = num_protos - 1;
192  for (uint32_t block_idx = 0u; block_idx < num_blocks; ++block_idx) {
193  BlockProto block_proto;
194  if (!utils::readProtoMsgFromStream(&proto_file, &block_proto,
195  &tmp_byte_offset)) {
196  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not read block protobuf message number "
197  << block_idx;
198  return false;
199  }
200 
201  if (!(*layer_ptr)
202  ->addBlockFromProto(
203  block_proto,
204  Layer<VoxelType>::BlockMergingStrategy::kProhibit)) {
205  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not add the block protobuf message to the layer!";
206  return false;
207  }
208  }
209  } while (multiple_layer_support && !layer_found && !proto_file.eof());
210  return layer_found;
211 }
212 
213 // By default loads without multiple layer support (i.e., only checks the first
214 // layer in the file).
215 template <typename VoxelType>
216 bool LoadLayer(const std::string& file_path,
217  typename Layer<VoxelType>::Ptr* layer_ptr) {
218  constexpr bool multiple_layer_support = false;
219  return LoadLayer<VoxelType>(file_path, multiple_layer_support, layer_ptr);
220 }
221 
222 template <typename VoxelType>
223 bool SaveLayer(const Layer<VoxelType>& layer, const std::string& file_path,
224  bool clear_file) {
225  CHECK(!file_path.empty());
226  return layer.saveToFile(file_path, clear_file);
227 }
228 
229 template <typename VoxelType>
230 bool SaveLayerSubset(const Layer<VoxelType>& layer,
231  const std::string& file_path,
232  const BlockIndexList& blocks_to_include,
233  bool include_all_blocks) {
234  CHECK(!file_path.empty());
235  return layer.saveSubsetToFile(file_path, blocks_to_include,
236  include_all_blocks);
237 }
